ForceArmor.Description: Adds a new spell Force Armor functions similar to Shield of Faith for alchemists/bards/wizards and lasts longer.

MageArmor2.Description: Adds a new spell Mage Armor II that grants +6 AC.

MageArmor3.Description: Adds a new spell Mage Armor III that grants +8 AC.

MageArmor4.Description: Adds a new spell Mage Armor IV that grants +10 AC.

MageShield2.Description: Adds a new spell Shield II that lasts for an hour per level.
